name: Jahid Hassan Shamim
bio: I am a software developer dedicated to turning complicated ideas into practical solutions. I have improved my skills in database design, API development, and system architecture to deliver efficient and scalable systems. By collaborating closely with clients, I aim to understand their unique requirements and provide tailored solutions to enhance business growth.

experience.detail:
➢ Worked on 4 different project that are built with Flutter like content management app, Book app with Google book API for Readers community, PDF reader app with note taking and PDF creation functionality with an experience of deploying and implementing referrel points allocation on sharing
 ➢ Recently, Collaborating on 2 Backend projects where implemented Custom Admin panel, database design, API building, Cronjob, Securing APIs with APIKey

➢ Worked on Doctor and Patient portal (Personal Profiling for doctor and patient) for managing appointments and Chambers.
➢ Designing the user Interface and Integrated all APIs based on requirements.
